title: Remove a listing from your watchlist
description: Removes a listing from the authenticated user's watchlist.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

path.name: listingId
path.description: The ID of the listing to remove.

returns.description: <WatchListResponse> Details on whether the operation succeeded. Attempting to remove an auction that doesn't exist or is not on the watchlist will not produce an error.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
